text: durvalayin lesa salakanu labamin siti pirisata, mahapolove ehi api samrddhiya æti kala nægenahira disavan ha batahira disavan uruma kara dunimu. israil daruvan ivasimen siti bævin numbe paramadhipatige alamkara vadana ovun kerehi purnavat viya. firavun ha ohuge pirisa sidu karamin siti dæ da ovun usata tanamin siti dæ da api mulumaninma vinasa kara dæmuvemu
